Text: Thank you so much! I've had these for years and it's nice to get digital copies!
You're most welcome oskar5000. Glad I could help you out and hopefully pass on these books to a few new brains as well.
thanx. I say just what oskar said. have almost every one of these in a box with Instant Piano and Milk & Cheese. nice to have backups. (I've upped close to 2 gigs already!)
Awesome mumphabot! Thanks for helping out, it's very much appreciated. I should probably get around to upping 'Instant Piano'.
